title: Introduction to Design and Innovation
headline: Learn about the Jaipur foot innovation, user-centered design, and distribution challenges with this free online course.
description: Introduction to Design and Innovation is a free online course that offers some great insights into the basics of Jaipur foot. You will learn about the prosthesis as an important case study for innovation and the user-centered helmet design, along with its engineering process. You will gain an understanding of the Solar Urja Lamp project, its background and purpose. Start this course today and enhance your knowledge of innovation.
courseDescription:
Introduction to Design and Innovation is a free online course that begins by introducing you to the Jaipur foot as an important case study as well as the prosthesis, which is a significant part of this innovation. You will learn about its unique design and the components of the product. You will also be introduced to the distribution of Jaipur foot and limb fitments across India and other countries in the world. You will become familiar with the three sections of Jaipur's foot as well as their advantages.

This course then explains the concept of user-centred helmet design, its engineering process, construction as well as the user requirements for comfort and ease. You will learn about the current scenario in India, the ease of storage cluster ideas for the helmets, and the ease of use cluster. This course will also teach you about product detailing as well as the advantages and disadvantages of different helmet concepts.

Furthermore, you will get familiar with the solar project known as Solar Urja Lamp project. You will learn about India's need for energy. This course will introduce you to the types of technology interventions, supply chain as well as the objectives and scope of the Solar Urja Lamp project. This free online course will be of great interest to students, researchers, and anyone with an interest in technology and innovation. So, register for this course and start your next learning journey today.
